## Status Update Template

Use this when updating task status:

```markdown
### [Date] - Task #X Update
**Status Change:** [Old Status] ‚Üí [New Status]
**Progress:** [X%]
**Time Spent:** [X hours]
**Remaining:** [X hours]

**What was done:**
- Item 1
- Item 2

**Next steps:**
- Next item 1
- Next item 2

**Blockers/Issues:**
- [Any new blockers or issues]

**Notes:**
- [Any relevant notes or learnings]
```

---

## Task Completion Checklist

Before marking a task as complete:

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Code reviewed (if applicable)
- [ ] Tests written and passing
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Changes committed with descriptive message
- [ ] Changes pushed to GitHub
- [ ] PROJECT_PLAN.md updated with completion
- [ ] PROGRESS_TRACKER.md updated
- [ ] Sprint/Milestone progress updated
- [ ] Next task identified and prioritized
